Mkpebi Iri abụọ na àtó nke United Nations Security Council, nke a nakweere n'ọnwa Eprel ụbọchị iri na asatọ, afọ 1947, kpebiri na kọmitii nke United Nations Security Council Resolution 15 mepụtara ga-anọgide na mpaghara ahụ ma gbasaa.
Mkpebi ahụ gafere na votu itoolu na-enweghị onye; Poland na Soviet Union ekweghị.
